SEARCH
Package cz.itnetwork.service

Class InvoiceServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
cz.itnetwork.service.InvoiceServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
InvoiceService
@Service public class InvoiceServiceImpl extends Object implements InvoiceService
Implementation of the InvoiceService interface providing business logic for managing invoices.

This class provides methods for creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting invoices, as well as obtaining invoice statistics.

Since:
2024

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
